tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE balance_changes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_log (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id UUID,
  user_id UUID,
  old_balance DECIMAL,
  new_balance DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
